name: Murasaki Tsurugi
description: Murasaki Tsurugi is an explosive puzzle game. While this is a sequel to Murasaki, you can fully enjoy the game even without having played the previous title. Compared with the last game, this one is even more refreshing and fun to play.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Core 2 Duo or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
